title: Well worth 99$ plus tax
text: Was there 2 weeks ago. I must agree with all the "positive" comments in this forum regarding breakfast, staff, fino restaurant, etc. The only negative point would be the window of room 609 (where we stayed for a couple of nights) it was slightly broken...very thin windows, outdoor noises get through easily. I had to put the extra pillows (on the window) as a camouflage to cut the noise! I reserved directly via email, cheapest way. Fair deal.
